mapper.select: select b.bid_id as id, b.price, b.bid_time, b.is_success, u.id as user_id, i.item_id as item_id from Bid b left join User u on b.user_id = u.id left join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id
mapper.insert: insert into Bid(item_id, user_id, price, bid_time, is_success) values (#{itemId}, #{userId}, #{price}, #{bidTime}, #{isSuccess})
mapper.select: select max(b.price) as price from Bid b group by b.item_id having b.item_id = #{itemId}

select b.bid_id as id, b.price, b.bid_time, b.is_success, u.id as user_id, i.item_id as item_id from Bid b left join User u on b.user_id = u.id left join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id where b.bid_id = #{bidId}
select price from Bid where item_id = #{itemId} order by price

SELECT b.item_id as itemNum, b.user_id as userId, i.name as itemName, b.price as price, img.url as imgUrl, i.customs_id as customsId, c.name as customsName FROM (SELECT item_id, MAX(bid_time), user_id, price FROM Bid where is_success = 1 GROUP BY item_id) b join Item i on b.item_id = i.item_id join (select item_id, url from Image where seq = 0) img on i.item_id = img.item_id join Customs c on i.customs_id = c.id where b.user_id = #{id};

select i.item_id as itemId, i.name as name, img.url as imgUrl, i.start_time as startTime, i.end_time as endTime, d.invoice_number as invoiceNum, d.status as status, d.code as code from Item i left join (SELECT item_id, MAX(bid_time), is_success FROM Bid where is_success = 1 GROUP BY item_id) b on i.item_id = b.item_id left join Delivery d on i.item_id = d.item_id left join (select item_id, url from Image where seq = 0) img on i.item_id = img.item_id where customs_id = #{id} and b.is_success = 1;
